title: Master, I Want to See
itunes:title: Master, I Want to See
description: The story of the healing of blind Bartimaeus is a spiritual icon of enormous power. Bartimaeus is evocative of anyone who, aware of his sin, blindness, and incapacity, hears the summons of Jesus to come into the Church, the place where vision will be restored.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
